Header.title: Get your next style
Header.paragraph: Repurpose is aimed to redefine your outlook on shopping

About.paragraph: Thrift markets are a huge unorganized sector in India who's hidden potential hasn't been tapped yet.Thus there is a need for a platform with history of clothing business to unify these sellers and give the consumers a platform to not only exchange clothes but also recommend the next new set of shoes available on Myntra that would match them. Myntra Repurpose is conceptualized on the Socialise Theme of Hackerramp.
Why: A platform for influencers to improve their brand
Adds personal touch to online shopping
Why2: Possibility of finding vintage and unique items
Reduced fashion waste i.e improved clothing lifecycle

Features.title: One stop solution
Features.text: It is a one stop solution for fashion market where people can both buy and sell products.

Features.title: Socialise
Features.text: Partner with influencers/fashionistas to market their thrifts as it adds more credibility and gains traction.

Features.title: Myntra Recommendation
Features.text: Recommend similar or related Myntra products which would complement your purchase. It would also increase user base for Myntra.

Features.title: Myntra's Trust
Features.text: Trust is the main thing while buying used products. We will use Myntra's brand value to get headstart in building it.
